verses.verse: <S%G2385>James<s%>, a <S%G1401>servant<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> of the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%>, to the <S%G1427>twelve<s%> <S%G5443>tribes<s%> <S%G1722>which<s%> are scattered <S%G1290>abroad<s%>, <S%G5463>greeting<s%>.

<S%G3450>My<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, count <S%G2233>it<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G5479>joy<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> ye <S%G4045>fall<s%> into <S%G4164>divers<s%> <S%G3986>temptations<s%>; temptations: or, trials
<S%G1097>Knowing<s%> this, <S%G3754>that<s%> the <S%G1383>trying<s%> of <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%> <S%G2716>worketh<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G2192>let<s%> <S%G5281>patience<s%> <S%G2192>have<s%> her <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G2041>work<s%>, <S%G2443>that<s%> ye may <S%G5600>be<s%> <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3648>entire<s%>, <S%G3007>wanting<s%> <S%G1722>nothing<s%> <S%G3367><s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> If <S%G1536>any<s%> of <S%G5216>you<s%> <S%G3007>lack<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%>, let him <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>, that <S%G1325>giveth<s%> to <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G574>liberally<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3679>upbraideth<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> it shall be <S%G1325>given<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> let him <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G4102>faith<s%>, <S%G3367>nothing<s%> <S%G1252>wavering<s%>. <S%G1063>For<s%> he that <S%G1252>wavereth<s%> is <S%G1503>like<s%> a <S%G2830>wave<s%> of the <S%G2281>sea<s%> driven with the <S%G416>wind<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4494>tossed<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G3633>let<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G3633>think<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> he shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> any <S%G5100>thing<s%> <S%G3844>of<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%>.
A double <S%G1374>minded<s%> <S%G435>man<s%> is <S%G182>unstable<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3598>ways<s%>.

<S%G1161><s%> <S%G2744>Let<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> of low <S%G5011>degree<s%> <S%G2744>rejoice<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> is <S%G5311>exalted<s%>: rejoice: or, glory rejoice: or, glory

<S%G1161>But<s%> the <S%G4145>rich<s%>, <S%G1722>in<s%> that <S%G846>he<s%> is made <S%G5014>low<s%>: <S%G3754>because<s%> <S%G5613>as<s%> the <S%G438>flower<s%> of the <S%G5528>grass<s%> he shall pass <S%G3928>away<s%>.

<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G2246>sun<s%> is no sooner <S%G393>risen<s%> <S%G4862>with<s%> a burning <S%G2742>heat<s%>, <S%G2532>but<s%> it <S%G3583>withereth<s%> the <S%G5528>grass<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G438>flower<s%> <S%G846>thereof<s%> <S%G1601>falleth<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G2143>grace<s%> of the <S%G4383>fashion<s%> of <S%G846>it<s%> <S%G622>perisheth<s%>: <S%G3779>so<s%> <S%G2532>also<s%> <S%G3133>shall<s%> the rich <S%G4145>man<s%> fade <S%G3133>away<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4197>ways<s%>.

<S%G3107>Blessed<s%> is the <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G5278>endureth<s%> <S%G3986>temptation<s%>: <S%G3754>for<s%> when he is <S%G1384>tried<s%> <S%G1096><s%>, he shall <S%G2983>receive<s%> the <S%G4735>crown<s%> of <S%G2222>life<s%>, <S%G3739>which<s%> the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> hath <S%G1861>promised<s%> to them that <S%G25>love<s%> <S%G846>him<s%>.

<S%G3004>Let<s%> no <S%G3367>man<s%> <S%G3004>say<s%> when he is <S%G3985>tempted<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> I am <S%G3985>tempted<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> cannot be <S%G551>tempted<s%> <S%G2076><s%> with <S%G2556>evil<s%>, <S%G1161>neither<s%> <S%G3985>tempteth<s%> <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G3985><s%> any <S%G3762>man<s%>: evil: or, evils
<S%G1161>But<s%> every <S%G1538>man<s%> is <S%G3985>tempted<s%>, when he is drawn <S%G1828>away<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> his <S%G2398>own<s%> <S%G1939>lust<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1185>enticed<s%>.

<S%G1534>Then<s%> when <S%G1939>lust<s%> hath <S%G4815>conceived<s%>, it bringeth <S%G5088>forth<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>: <S%G1161>and<s%> <S%G266>sin<s%>, when it is <S%G658>finished<s%>, bringeth <S%G616>forth<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>.
<S%G4105>Do<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G4105>err<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>.

<S%G3956>Every<s%> <S%G18>good<s%> <S%G1394>gift<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G1434>gift<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> from <S%G509>above<s%>, and cometh <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> of <S%G5457>lights<s%>, <S%G3844>with<s%> <S%G3739>whom<s%> <S%G1762>is<s%> <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3883>variableness<s%>, <S%G2228>neither<s%> <S%G644>shadow<s%> of <S%G5157>turning<s%>.

Of his own <S%G1014>will<s%> begat <S%G616>he<s%> <S%G2248>us<s%> with the <S%G3056>word<s%> of <S%G225>truth<s%>, <S%G1519>that<s%> <S%G2248>we<s%> should <S%G1511>be<s%> a <S%G5100>kind<s%> of <S%G536>firstfruits<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2938>creatures<s%>.

<S%G5620>Wherefore<s%>, <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G27>beloved<s%> <S%G80>brethren<s%>, <S%G2077>let<s%> <S%G3956>every<s%> <S%G444>man<s%> <S%G2077>be<s%> <S%G5036>swift<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G191>hear<s%>, <S%G1021>slow<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2980>speak<s%>, <S%G1021>slow<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G3709>wrath<s%>:
<S%G1063>For<s%> the <S%G3709>wrath<s%> of <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2716>worketh<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> the <S%G1343>righteousness<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%>.

<S%G1352>Wherefore<s%> lay <S%G659>apart<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G4507>filthiness<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4050>superfluity<s%> of <S%G2549>naughtiness<s%>, and <S%G1209>receive<s%> <S%G1722>with<s%> <S%G4240>meekness<s%> the <S%G1721>engrafted<s%> <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4982>save<s%> <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G5590>souls<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> be <S%G1096>ye<s%> <S%G4163>doers<s%> of the <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G202>hearers<s%> <S%G3440>only<s%>, <S%G3884>deceiving<s%> your own <S%G1438>selves<s%>.

<S%G3754>For<s%> if <S%G1536>any<s%> <S%G2076>be<s%> a <S%G202>hearer<s%> of the <S%G3056>word<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G4163>doer<s%>, <S%G3778>he<s%> is <S%G1503>like<s%> unto a <S%G435>man<s%> <S%G2657>beholding<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1078>natural<s%> <S%G4383>face<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> a <S%G2072>glass<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> he <S%G2657>beholdeth<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> goeth his <S%G565>way<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2112>straightway<s%> <S%G1950>forgetteth<s%> what manner of <S%G3697>man<s%> he <S%G2258>was<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> whoso <S%G3879>looketh<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G5046>perfect<s%> <S%G3551>law<s%> of <S%G1657>liberty<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G3887>continueth<s%> therein, <S%G3778>he<s%> <S%G1096>being<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> a <S%G1953>forgetful<s%> <S%G202>hearer<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> a <S%G4163>doer<s%> of the <S%G2041>work<s%>, this <S%G3778>man<s%> shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3107>blessed<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G4162>deed<s%>. deed: or, doing

If any <S%G1536>man<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> <S%G1380>seem<s%> to <S%G1511>be<s%> <S%G2357>religious<s%>, and <S%G5468>bridleth<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1100>tongue<s%>, <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G538>deceiveth<s%> his <S%G846>own<s%> <S%G2588>heart<s%>, this <S%G5127>man's<s%> <S%G2356>religion<s%> is <S%G3152>vain<s%>.

<S%G2513>Pure<s%> <S%G2356>religion<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G283>undefiled<s%> <S%G3844>before<s%> <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%>, To <S%G1980>visit<s%> the <S%G3737>fatherless<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5503>widows<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G846>their<s%> <S%G2347>affliction<s%>, and to <S%G5083>keep<s%> <S%G1438>himself<s%> <S%G784>unspotted<s%> <S%G575>from<s%> the <S%G2889>world<s%>.
